15052CGL_void CGL_simple_neural_network_destroy(CGL_simple_neural_network* network)
15053{
15054 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < network->layer_count; i++)
15055 {
15056 CGL_simple_neural_network_layer* layer = network->layers + i;
15057 CGL_free(layer->weights);
15058 CGL_free(layer->activations);
15059 CGL_free(layer->errors);
15060 }
15061 CGL_free(network->layers);
15062 CGL_free(network);
15063}
15064
15065CGL_void CGL_simple_neural_network_evaluate(CGL_simple_neural_network* network, CGL_float* input, CGL_float* output)
15066{
15067 CGL_simple_neural_network_layer* layer_pr = network->layers; // layer 0
15068 CGL_simple_neural_network_layer* layer_cr = layer_pr + 1; // layer 1
15069 memcpy(layer_pr->activations, input, sizeof(CGL_float) * layer_pr->output_count); // copy input to layer 0
15070 layer_pr->activations[layer_pr->output_count] = 1.0f; // bias
15071 for (CGL_int i = 1; i < network->layer_count; i++)
15072 {
15073 for (CGL_int j = 0; j < layer_cr->output_count; j++)
15074 {
15075 CGL_float sum = 0.0f;
15076 for (CGL_int k = 0; k < layer_pr->output_count + 1; k++)
15077 sum += layer_pr->activations[k] * layer_cr->weights[k * layer_cr->output_count + j];
15078 layer_cr->activations[j] = layer_cr->activation_function(sum);
15079 }
15080 layer_cr->activations[layer_cr->output_count] = 1.0f; // bias
15081 layer_pr = layer_cr; layer_cr++;
15082 }
15083 if (output) memcpy(output, layer_pr->activations, sizeof(CGL_float) * layer_pr->output_count);
15084}
15085
15086CGL_void CGL_simple_neural_network_train(CGL_simple_neural_network* a, CGL_float* input, CGL_float* output, CGL_float learning_rate)
15087{
15088 CGL_simple_neural_network_evaluate(a, input, NULL); // evaluate network for prediced output
15089 CGL_simple_neural_network_layer* layer_pr = a->layers + a->layer_count - 1; // layer 0
15090 CGL_simple_neural_network_layer* layer_cr = layer_pr - 1; // layer 1
15091 // calculate errors for the last layer
15092 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < layer_pr->output_count; i++)
15093 layer_pr->errors[i] = (output[i] - layer_pr->activations[i]) * layer_pr->activation_function_derivative(layer_pr->activations[i]);
15094 // calculate (propagate) errors for the rest of the layers
15095 for (CGL_int i = a->layer_count - 2; i >= 0; i--) // loop through layers n-1 to 0
15096 {
15097 for (CGL_int j = 0; j < layer_cr->output_count; j++) // loop through neurons in current layer
15098 {
15099 // error[j] = sum(error[k] * weight[j][k]) * derivative(activation[j])
15100 CGL_float sum = 0.0f; // accumulator for sum
15101 for (CGL_int k = 0; k < layer_pr->output_count; k++)
15102 sum += layer_pr->errors[k] * layer_pr->weights[j * layer_pr->output_count + k]; // accumulate sum
15103 layer_cr->errors[j] = sum * layer_cr->activation_function_derivative(layer_cr->activations[j]); // calculte error for the neuron
15104 }
15105 layer_pr = layer_cr; layer_cr--; // update layer pointers
15106 }
15107 layer_pr = a->layers; // layer 0
15108 layer_cr = layer_pr + 1; // layer 1
15109 // update weights with respect to respective errors of neurons and layers
15110 for (CGL_int i = 1; i < a->layer_count; i++)
15111 {
15112 for (CGL_int j = 0; j < layer_cr->output_count; j++)
15113 {
15114 for (CGL_int k = 0; k < layer_pr->output_count + 1; k++)
15115 layer_cr->weights[k * layer_cr->output_count + j] += learning_rate * layer_pr->activations[k] * layer_cr->errors[j];
15116 }
15117 layer_pr = layer_cr; layer_cr++;
15118 }
15119}
15120
15121CGL_void CGL_simple_neural_network_copy_weights(CGL_simple_neural_network* a, CGL_simple_neural_network* b)
15122{
15123 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < a->layer_count; i++) memcpy(a->layers[i].weights, b->layers[i].weights, sizeof(CGL_float) * a->layers[i].weight_count);
15124}
15125
15126CGL_void CGL_simple_neural_network_mutate(CGL_simple_neural_network* a, CGL_float mutation_ratio)
15127{
15128 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < a->layer_count; i++) for (CGL_int j = 0; j < a->layers[i].weight_count; j++) if (CGL_utils_random_float_in_range(0.0f, 1.0f) < mutation_ratio) a->layers[i].weights[j] += CGL_utils_random_gaussian(0.0f, 0.1f);
15129}
15130
15131
15132struct CGL_linear_regression_context
15133{
15134 CGL_matrix* coefficents;
15135 CGL_matrix* input;
15136 CGL_float* input_data;
15137 CGL_matrix* evaluate_temp0;
15138 CGL_matrix* train_temp0;
15139 CGL_int input_count;
15140};
15141
15142CGL_linear_regression_context* CGL_linear_regression_context_create(CGL_int input_count_)
15143{
15144 CGL_linear_regression_context* context = (CGL_linear_regression_context*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_linear_regression_context));
15145 context->input_count = input_count_;
15146 context->coefficents = CGL_matrix_create(1, input_count_ + 1);
15147 context->input = CGL_matrix_create(input_count_ + 1, 1);
15148 context->evaluate_temp0 = CGL_matrix_create(1, 1);
15149 context->train_temp0 = CGL_matrix_create(1, input_count_ + 1);
15150 context->input_data = (CGL_float*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_float) * (input_count_ + 1));
15151 return context;
15152}
15153
15154CGL_void CGL_linear_regression_context_destroy(CGL_linear_regression_context* context)
15155{
15156 CGL_matrix_destroy(context->coefficents);
15157 CGL_matrix_destroy(context->input);
15158 CGL_matrix_destroy(context->evaluate_temp0);
15159 CGL_matrix_destroy(context->train_temp0);
15160 CGL_free(context->input_data);
15161 CGL_free(context);
15162}
15163
15164CGL_void CGL_linear_regression_randomize_coefficents(CGL_linear_regression_context* context, CGL_float min_v, CGL_float max_v)
15165{
15166 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < context->input_count + 1; i++) CGL_matrix_set_elem(context->coefficents, 0, i, CGL_utils_random_float_in_range(min_v, max_v));
15167}
15168
15169CGL_float CGL_linear_regression_evaluate(CGL_linear_regression_context* context, CGL_float* input, CGL_float* output)
15170{
15171 memcpy(context->input_data, input, sizeof(CGL_float) * context->input_count);
15172 context->input_data[context->input_count] = 1.0f;
15173 CGL_matrix_set_col(context->input, 0, context->input_data);
15174 CGL_matrix_mul_to(context->coefficents, context->input, context->evaluate_temp0);
15175 if (output) *output = CGL_matrix_get_elem(context->evaluate_temp0, 0, 0);
15176 return CGL_matrix_get_elem(context->evaluate_temp0, 0, 0);
15177}
15178
15179CGL_bool CGL_linear_regression_train(CGL_linear_regression_context* context, CGL_linear_regression_sample_function sample_function, void* user_data, CGL_int sample_count, CGL_float learning_rate, CGL_int max_iterations)
15180{
15181 CGL_float y_hat = 0.0f, error = 0.0f, factor = 0.0f;
15182 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < max_iterations; i++)
15183 {
15184 context->train_temp0 = CGL_matrix_make_zero(context->train_temp0);
15185 for (CGL_int k = 0; k < sample_count; k++)
15186 {
15187 y_hat = sample_function(user_data, context->input_data, &y_hat, k);
15188 CGL_matrix_set_col(context->input, 0, context->input_data);
15189 CGL_matrix_mul_to(context->coefficents, context->input, context->evaluate_temp0);
15190 error = CGL_matrix_get_elem(context->evaluate_temp0, 0, 0) - y_hat;
15191 for (CGL_int j = 0; j < context->input_count + 1; j++)
15192 CGL_matrix_set_elem(context->train_temp0, 0, j, CGL_matrix_get_elem(context->train_temp0, 0, j) + error * CGL_matrix_get_elem(context->input, j, 0));
15193 }
15194 factor = -learning_rate / (CGL_float)sample_count;
15195 CGL_matrix_scale_to(context->train_temp0, factor);
15196 CGL_matrix_add_to(context->coefficents, context->train_temp0, context->coefficents);
15197 }
15198 return CGL_TRUE;
15199}
15200
15201
15202#endif
15203
15204
15205#ifndef CGL_EXCLUDE_PATH_FINDING_API
15206
15207struct CGL_path_finding_a_star_context
15208{
15209 CGL_path_finding_node* nodes;
15210 CGL_path_finding_node* start_node;
15211 CGL_path_finding_node* current_node;
15212 void* user_data;
15213 CGL_byte* nodes_data;
15214 CGL_int max_nodes_count;
15215 CGL_int nodes_count;
15216 CGL_int nodes_data_size;
15217 CGL_bool copy_data;
15218};
15219
15220CGL_void CGL_path_finding_node_init(CGL_path_finding_node* node, void* data_ptr)
15221{
15222 node->data_ptr = data_ptr;
15223 node->id = node->parent_id = node->child_id = -1;
15224 node->is_open = CGL_FALSE;
15225 node->is_active = CGL_FALSE;
15226 node->g = node->h = node->f = 0.0f;
15227}
15228
15229CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* CGL_path_finding_a_star_context_create(CGL_int max_nodes_count, CGL_bool copy_data, CGL_int data_size)
15230{
15231 CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context = (CGL_path_finding_a_star_context*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context));
15232 context->nodes = (CGL_path_finding_node*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_path_finding_node) * max_nodes_count);
15233 if (copy_data) context->nodes_data = (CGL_byte*)CGL_malloc(CGL_utils_max(data_size, 1) * max_nodes_count); else context->nodes_data = NULL;
15234 context->max_nodes_count = max_nodes_count;
15235 context->nodes_count = 0;
15236 context->nodes_data_size = data_size;
15237 context->copy_data = copy_data;
15238 context->start_node = NULL;
15239 context->user_data = NULL;
15240 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < max_nodes_count; i++) context->nodes[i].data_ptr = context->nodes_data + i * context->nodes_data_size;
15241 return context;
15242}
15243
15244static CGL_int __CGL_path_finding_a_star_find_node(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context, CGL_path_finding_node* node, CGL_path_finding_node_equals_function node_equals_function)
15245{
15246 CGL_path_finding_node* nodes = context->nodes;
15247 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < context->max_nodes_count; i++) if (nodes[i].is_active) if (node_equals_function(context->user_data, &nodes[i], node)) return i;
15248 return -1;
15249}
15250
15251static CGL_int __CGL_path_finding_a_star_add_node(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context, CGL_path_finding_node* node, CGL_path_finding_node_equals_function node_equals_function)
15252{
15253 node->id = __CGL_path_finding_a_star_find_node(context, node, node_equals_function); if (node->id != -1) return node->id;
15254 CGL_path_finding_node* nodes = context->nodes;
15255 if (context->nodes_count >= context->max_nodes_count) return -1;
15256 //for(CGL_int i = 0 ; i < context->max_nodes_count ; i++) if(!nodes[i].is_active) // find inactive node
15257 CGL_int i = context->nodes_count;
15258 {
15259 node->id = i; nodes[i] = *node;
15260 if (context->copy_data) nodes[i].data_ptr = context->nodes_data + i * context->nodes_data_size;
15261 nodes[i].is_active = true;
15262 if (context->copy_data) memcpy(context->nodes_data + i * context->nodes_data_size, node->data_ptr, context->nodes_data_size);
15263 //CGL_int *data = (CGL_int*)(context->nodes_data + i * context->nodes_data_size);
15264 context->nodes_count++;
15265 return node->id;
15266 }
15267 // return -1;
15268}
15269
15270static CGL_int __CGL_path_finding_a_star_find_node_with_lowest_f(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context)
15271{
15272 CGL_path_finding_node* nodes = context->nodes;
15273 CGL_int lowest_f_node = -1;
15274 CGL_float lowest_f_v = 0.0f;
15275 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < context->max_nodes_count; i++) if (nodes[i].is_active && nodes[i].is_open && (lowest_f_node == -1 || nodes[i].f <= lowest_f_v)) { lowest_f_node = i; lowest_f_v = nodes[i].f; }
15276 // CGL_int *data = (CGL_int*)nodes[lowest_f_node].data_ptr;
15277 nodes[lowest_f_node].is_open = false;
15278 return lowest_f_node;
15279}
15280
15281/*
15282// for debug
15283static void __CGL_path_finding_a_star_print_nodes(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context)
15284{
15285 CGL_path_finding_node* nodes = context->nodes;
15286 printf("Nodes [ ");
15287 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < context->nodes_count; i++)
15288 {
15289 CGL_int* dat = (CGL_int*)nodes[i].data_ptr;
15290 printf("{ (%d -> %d %d) (%d %d) -> %f %s} ", i, nodes[i].parent_id, nodes[i].child_id, *dat % 10, *dat / 10, nodes[i].f, nodes[i].is_open ? "open" : "closed");
15291 }
15292 printf("]\n");
15293}
15294*/
15295
15296static void __CGL_path_finding_a_star_calculate_gfh(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context, CGL_int node, CGL_int parent_node, CGL_path_finding_heuristic_function heuristic_function, CGL_path_finding_cost_function cost_function, CGL_int node_count_old)
15297{
15298 //context->nodes[node].h = heuristic_function(context->user_data, &context->nodes[node]);
15299 CGL_float total_cost = context->nodes[parent_node].g + cost_function(context->user_data, &context->nodes[parent_node], &context->nodes[node]);
15300 if (node_count_old <= node)
15301 {
15302 context->nodes[node].g = total_cost;
15303 context->nodes[node].h = heuristic_function(context->user_data, &context->nodes[node]);
15304 context->nodes[node].is_open = true;
15305 context->nodes[node].parent_id = parent_node;
15306 }
15307 else if (total_cost <= context->nodes[node].g)
15308 {
15309 context->nodes[node].g = total_cost;
15310 context->nodes[node].parent_id = parent_node;
15311 context->nodes[node].is_open = true;
15312 }
15313 context->nodes[node].f = context->nodes[node].g + context->nodes[node].h;
15314}
15315
15316CGL_int __CGL_path_finding_a_star_get_open_node_count(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context)
15317{
15318 CGL_int count = 0;
15319 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < context->max_nodes_count; i++) if (context->nodes[i].is_active && context->nodes[i].is_open) count++;
15320 return count;
15321}
15322
15323CGL_int CGL_path_finding_a_star_add_node(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context, CGL_path_finding_node node, CGL_path_finding_node_equals_function node_equals_function)
15324{
15325 return __CGL_path_finding_a_star_add_node(context, &node, node_equals_function);
15326}
15327
15328
15329// the actual a* algorithm
15330CGL_bool CGL_path_finding_a_star_find_path(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context, CGL_path_finding_node start_node_n, CGL_path_finding_node end_node_n, CGL_path_finding_heuristic_function heuristic_function, CGL_path_finding_cost_function cost_function, CGL_path_finding_get_neighbors_function get_neighbors_function, CGL_path_finding_node_equals_function node_equals_function, void* user_data)
15331{
15332 CGL_path_finding_a_star_clear_path(context); // clear previous path
15333 CGL_path_finding_node* nodes = context->nodes; // shorthand
15334 CGL_int start_node = __CGL_path_finding_a_star_add_node(context, &start_node_n, node_equals_function); // add start node
15335 context->start_node = &context->nodes[start_node]; // update context variable
15336 context->user_data = user_data; // update context variable
15337 if (start_node == -1) return CGL_FALSE; // if initial couldn't be added, return
15338 CGL_int current_node = start_node; // current node is start node
15339 CGL_int neighbors[CGL_PATH_FINDING_A_STAR_MAX_NEIGHBOURS], neighbour_count = 0; // array of storing neighbors
15340 CGL_int epochs = 0, node_count_old = 0; // epochs is used to prevent infinite loops
15341 while (__CGL_path_finding_a_star_get_open_node_count(context) > 0 && epochs <= 100 * context->max_nodes_count) // while there are open nodes
15342 {
15343 epochs++; current_node = __CGL_path_finding_a_star_find_node_with_lowest_f(context); // find node with lowest f
15344 if (node_equals_function(context->user_data, &nodes[current_node], &end_node_n)) // if current node is end node
15345 {
15346 // reorder path
15347 while (current_node != start_node)
15348 {
15349 CGL_int tmp = current_node;
15350 current_node = nodes[current_node].parent_id;
15351 nodes[current_node].child_id = tmp;
15352 }
15353 CGL_path_finding_a_star_reorder_path(context); // set transversal cursor to start node
15354 return true; // path found successfully
15355 }
15356 nodes[current_node].is_open = false; node_count_old = context->nodes_count; // close current node
15357 neighbour_count = get_neighbors_function(context->user_data, &nodes[current_node], neighbors); // get neighbors
15358 for (CGL_int j = 0; j < neighbour_count; j++) if (neighbors[j] != -1) // for each valid neighbor
15359 {
15360 context->nodes[neighbors[j]].is_open = false; // close neighbor (will be opened if needed)
15361 __CGL_path_finding_a_star_calculate_gfh(context, neighbors[j], current_node, heuristic_function, cost_function, node_count_old); // calculate g, h and f for neighbor
15362 }
15363 }
15364 return false; // path not found
15365}
15366
15367CGL_float CGL_path_finding_a_star_get_path_length(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context)
15368{
15369 if (context->start_node == NULL) return 0.0f;
15370 CGL_path_finding_node* node = context->start_node;
15371 CGL_float length_v = 0.0f;
15372 while (node->child_id != -1)
15373 {
15374 length_v += node->g;
15375 node = &context->nodes[node->child_id];
15376 }
15377 return length_v;
15378}
15379
15380CGL_path_finding_node* CGL_path_finding_a_star_get_path_start_node(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context)
15381{
15382 return context->start_node;
15383}
15384
15385CGL_bool CGL_path_finding_a_star_has_path(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context)
15386{
15387 return context->start_node != NULL;
15388}
15389
15390CGL_void CGL_path_finding_a_star_reorder_path(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context)
15391{
15392 context->current_node = context->start_node;
15393}
15394
15395CGL_void* CGL_path_finding_a_star_next_in_path(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context, void* data_out)
15396{
15397 if (context->current_node == NULL) return NULL;
15398 CGL_path_finding_node* cn_copy = context->current_node;
15399 if (context->current_node->child_id == -1) context->current_node = NULL;
15400 else context->current_node = &context->nodes[context->current_node->child_id];
15401 if (cn_copy && data_out) memcpy(data_out, cn_copy->data_ptr, context->nodes_data_size);
15402 return cn_copy;
15403}
15404CGL_void CGL_path_finding_a_star_clear_path(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context)
15405{
15406 context->start_node = NULL;
15407 context->current_node = NULL;
15408 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < context->max_nodes_count; i++)
15409 {
15410 context->nodes[i].is_open = CGL_FALSE;
15411 context->nodes[i].is_active = CGL_FALSE;
15412 context->nodes[i].parent_id = context->nodes[i].child_id = -1;
15413 context->nodes[i].g = context->nodes[i].h = context->nodes[i].f = 0.0f;
15414 }
15415 if (context->copy_data) memset(context->nodes_data, 0, context->nodes_data_size * context->max_nodes_count);
15416 context->nodes_count = 0;
15417}
15418
15419CGL_void CGL_path_finding_a_star_context_destroy(CGL_path_finding_a_star_context* context)
15420{
15421 CGL_free(context->nodes);
15422 if (context->copy_data) CGL_free(context->nodes_data);
15423 CGL_free(context);
15424}
15425
15426#endif
15427
15428
15429#ifndef CGL_EXCLUDE_CSV_API
15430
15431struct CGL_csv
15432{
15433 CGL_sizei item_max_size;
15434 CGL_sizei column_count;
15435 CGL_sizei row_count;
15436 CGL_list* parser_list;
15437 CGL_byte* item_buffer;
15438 CGL_list* columns;
15439};
15440
15441CGL_csv* CGL_csv_create(CGL_sizei item_max_size)
15442{
15443 CGL_csv* csv = CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_csv));
15444 if (csv == NULL) return NULL;
15445 csv->item_buffer = CGL_malloc(item_max_size + 100);
15446 if (csv->item_buffer == NULL)
15447 {
15448 CGL_free(csv);
15449 return NULL;
15450 }
15451 csv->columns = CGL_list_create(sizeof(CGL_list*), 100);
15452 if (csv->columns == NULL)
15453 {
15454 CGL_free(csv->item_buffer);
15455 CGL_free(csv);
15456 return NULL;
15457 }
15458 csv->parser_list = CGL_list_create(item_max_size, 100);
15459 if (csv->parser_list == NULL)
15460 {
15461 CGL_list_destroy(csv->columns);
15462 CGL_free(csv->item_buffer);
15463 CGL_free(csv);
15464 return NULL;
15465 }
15466 csv->item_max_size = item_max_size;
15467 csv->column_count = 0;
15468 csv->row_count = 0;
15469 return csv;
15470}
15471
15472CGL_void CGL_csv_destroy(CGL_csv* csv)
15473{
15474 CGL_sizei column_count = CGL_list_get_size(csv->columns);
15475 for (CGL_sizei i = 0; i < column_count; i++)
15476 {
15477 CGL_list* column = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, i, NULL);
15478 CGL_list_destroy(column);
15479 }
15480 CGL_list_destroy(csv->columns);
15481 CGL_list_destroy(csv->parser_list);
15482 CGL_free(csv->item_buffer);
15483 CGL_free(csv);
15484}
15485
15486#define __CGL_CSV_ERROR_AND_RETURN(...) \
15487{\
15488 CGL_log_internal(__VA_ARGS__); \
15489 return CGL_FALSE; \
15490}
15491
15492CGL_bool CGL_csv_load_from_buffer(CGL_csv* csv, const CGL_byte* buffer, const CGL_byte* seperator)
15493{
15494 CGL_sizei seperator_length = strlen(seperator);
15495 CGL_csv_clear(csv);
15496 CGL_sizei line_start_index = 0, current_index = 0, line_end_index = 0, line_number = 0, column_count = 0, prev_column_start = 0, seperator_count = 0, line_iterator = 0;
15497 while (buffer[current_index])
15498 {
15499 line_start_index = current_index;
15500 while (buffer[current_index] && (buffer[current_index] != '\n' && !(buffer[current_index] == '\r' && buffer[current_index + 1] == '\n'))) current_index++;
15501 line_end_index = current_index;
15502 if (buffer[current_index] == '\r' && buffer[current_index + 1] == '\n') current_index += 2; else current_index++;
15503 // fwrite(buffer + line_start_index, (line_end_index - line_start_index), 1, stdout);
15504 if (column_count != 0) if (line_end_index - line_start_index <= seperator_length * (column_count - 1)) __CGL_CSV_ERROR_AND_RETURN("CGL_csv_load_from_buffer: line %d is too short", line_number);
15505 if (line_end_index - line_start_index == 0) __CGL_CSV_ERROR_AND_RETURN("CGL_csv_load_from_buffer: line %d is empty", line_number);
15506 prev_column_start = line_start_index; seperator_count = 0;
15507 CGL_list_clear(csv->parser_list);
15508 for (line_iterator = line_start_index; line_iterator <= line_end_index - seperator_length; line_iterator++)
15509 {
15510 if (strncmp(buffer + line_iterator, seperator, seperator_length) == 0)
15511 {
15512 if (line_iterator - prev_column_start > csv->item_max_size) __CGL_CSV_ERROR_AND_RETURN("CGL_csv_load_from_buffer: item %d in line %d is too long", seperator_count, line_number);
15513 sprintf(csv->item_buffer, "%.*s ", (CGL_int)(line_iterator - prev_column_start), buffer + prev_column_start);
15514 CGL_list_push(csv->parser_list, csv->item_buffer);
15515 seperator_count++; line_iterator += seperator_length - 1; prev_column_start = line_iterator + 1;
15516 }
15517 }
15518 if (prev_column_start < line_end_index)
15519 {
15520 if (line_end_index - prev_column_start > csv->item_max_size) __CGL_CSV_ERROR_AND_RETURN("CGL_csv_load_from_buffer: item %d in line %d is too long", seperator_count, line_number);
15521 sprintf(csv->item_buffer, "%.*s ", (CGL_int)(line_end_index - prev_column_start), buffer + prev_column_start);
15522 CGL_list_push(csv->parser_list, csv->item_buffer);
15523 }
15524 if (line_number == 0) column_count = CGL_list_get_size(csv->parser_list);
15525 else if (CGL_list_get_size(csv->parser_list) != column_count) __CGL_CSV_ERROR_AND_RETURN("CGL_csv_load_from_buffer: line %d has %d columns, but %d columns are expected", line_number, CGL_list_get_size(csv->parser_list), column_count);
15526 if (line_number == 0) for (CGL_sizei i = 0; i < column_count; i++) CGL_csv_add_column(csv);
15527 CGL_csv_add_row(csv);
15528 for (CGL_sizei i = 0; i < column_count; i++)
15529 {
15530 CGL_list* column = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, i, NULL);
15531 CGL_list_set(column, line_number, CGL_list_get(csv->parser_list, i, NULL));
15532 }
15533 line_number++;
15534 }
15535 return CGL_TRUE;
15536}
15537
15538CGL_bool CGL_csv_load(CGL_csv* csv, const CGL_byte* file_path, const CGL_byte* seperator)
15539{
15540 CGL_byte* data = CGL_utils_read_file(file_path, NULL);
15541 if (data == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15542 CGL_bool result = CGL_csv_load_from_buffer(csv, data, seperator);
15543 CGL_free(data);
15544 return result;
15545}
15546
15547CGL_bool CGL_csv_save_to_buffer(CGL_csv* csv, CGL_byte* buffer, const CGL_byte* seperator)
15548{
15549 buffer[0] = '\0';
15550 CGL_sizei column_count = CGL_list_get_size(csv->columns);
15551 // NOTE: I am not sure wether to return false here
15552 // as this is technically not an error
15553 if (column_count == 0) return CGL_TRUE;
15554 CGL_list* first_column = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, 0, NULL);
15555 CGL_sizei row_count = CGL_list_get_size(first_column);
15556 for (CGL_sizei i = 0; i < row_count; i++)
15557 {
15558 for (CGL_sizei j = 0; j < column_count; j++)
15559 {
15560 CGL_list* column = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, j, NULL);
15561 if (j == column_count - 1) sprintf(csv->item_buffer, "%s%s", (CGL_byte*)CGL_list_get(column, i, NULL), CGL_NEWLINE);
15562 else sprintf(csv->item_buffer, "%s%s", (CGL_byte*)CGL_list_get(column, i, NULL), seperator);
15563 strcat(buffer, csv->item_buffer);
15564 }
15565 }
15566 return CGL_TRUE;
15567}
15568
15569CGL_bool CGL_csv_save(CGL_csv* csv, const CGL_byte* file_path, const CGL_byte* separator)
15570{
15571 static CGL_byte save_buffer[1024 * 1024 * 16];
15572 CGL_bool result = CGL_csv_save_to_buffer(csv, save_buffer, separator);
15573 if (!result) return CGL_FALSE;
15574 CGL_utils_write_file(file_path, save_buffer, strlen(save_buffer));
15575 return CGL_TRUE;
15576}
15577
15578CGL_bool CGL_csv_add_column(CGL_csv* csv)
15579{
15580 CGL_sizei prev_column_count = CGL_list_get_size(csv->columns);
15581 CGL_sizei row_count = 0;
15582 if (prev_column_count > 0)
15583 {
15584 CGL_list* column0 = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, 0, NULL);
15585 row_count = CGL_list_get_size(column0);
15586 }
15587 CGL_list* column = CGL_list_create(csv->item_max_size, 100);
15588 if (column == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15589 csv->item_buffer[0] = '\0';
15590 for (CGL_sizei i = 0; i < row_count; i++) CGL_list_push(column, csv->item_buffer);
15591 CGL_list_push(csv->columns, &column);
15592 csv->column_count++;
15593 return CGL_TRUE;
15594}
15595
15596CGL_bool CGL_csv_add_row(CGL_csv* csv)
15597{
15598 CGL_sizei column_count = CGL_list_get_size(csv->columns);
15599 csv->item_buffer[0] = '\0';
15600 for (CGL_sizei i = 0; i < column_count; i++)
15601 {
15602 CGL_list* column = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, i, NULL);
15603 CGL_list_push(column, csv->item_buffer);
15604 }
15605 return CGL_TRUE;
15606}
15607
15608CGL_byte* CGL_csv_set_item(CGL_csv* csv, CGL_int row, CGL_int column, const CGL_byte* item)
15609{
15610 CGL_list* column_ptr = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, column, NULL);
15611 if (column_ptr == NULL) return NULL;
15612 sprintf(csv->item_buffer, "%s", item);
15613 CGL_list_set(column_ptr, row, csv->item_buffer);
15614 return CGL_list_get(column_ptr, row, NULL);
15615}
15616
15617CGL_byte* CGL_csv_get_item(CGL_csv* csv, CGL_int row, CGL_int column, CGL_byte* item_out)
15618{
15619 CGL_list* column_ptr = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, column, NULL);
15620 if (column_ptr == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15621 CGL_byte* item = (CGL_byte*)CGL_list_get(column_ptr, row, NULL);
15622 if (item == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15623 if (item_out) sprintf(item_out, "%s", item);
15624 return item;
15625}
15626
15627CGL_bool CGL_csv_get_row(CGL_csv* csv, CGL_int row, CGL_byte* row_out)
15628{
15629 CGL_sizei column_count = CGL_list_get_size(csv->columns);
15630 for (CGL_sizei i = 0; i < column_count; i++)
15631 {
15632 CGL_list* column = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, i, NULL);
15633 CGL_byte* item = (CGL_byte*)CGL_list_get(column, row, NULL);
15634 if (item == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15635 sprintf(row_out + (csv->item_max_size * i), "%s", item);
15636 }
15637 return CGL_TRUE;
15638}
15639
15640
15641CGL_bool CGL_csv_get_column(CGL_csv* csv, CGL_int column, CGL_byte* column_out)
15642{
15643 CGL_list* column_ptr = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, column, NULL);
15644 if (column_ptr == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15645 CGL_sizei row_count = CGL_list_get_size(column_ptr);
15646 memcpy(column_out, column_ptr->data, row_count * csv->item_max_size);
15647 return CGL_TRUE;
15648}
15649
15650CGL_int CGL_csv_get_row_count(CGL_csv* csv)
15651{
15652 CGL_sizei column_count = CGL_list_get_size(csv->columns);
15653 if (column_count == 0) return 0;
15654 CGL_list* column = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, 0, NULL);
15655 CGL_sizei row_count = CGL_list_get_size(column);
15656 return (CGL_int)row_count;
15657}
15658
15659CGL_int CGL_csv_get_column_count(CGL_csv* csv)
15660{
15661 return (CGL_int)CGL_list_get_size(csv->columns);
15662}
15663
15664CGL_void CGL_csv_clear(CGL_csv* csv)
15665{
15666 CGL_sizei column_count = CGL_list_get_size(csv->columns);
15667 for (CGL_sizei i = 0; i < column_count; i++)
15668 {
15669 CGL_list* column = *(CGL_list**)CGL_list_get(csv->columns, i, NULL);
15670 CGL_list_destroy(column);
15671 }
15672 // while (CGL_list_get_size(csv->columns) > 0) CGL_list_pop(csv->columns, NULL);
15673 CGL_list_clear(csv->columns);
15674}
15675
15676
15677#endif
15678
15679#ifndef CGL_EXCLUDE_IMAGE_FILE_API
15680
15681CGL_bool CGL_image_file_is_png_f(FILE* file)
15682{
15683 static const CGL_ubyte png_signature[8] = { 137, 80, 78, 71, 13, 10, 26, 10 };
15684 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < 8; ++i)
15685 {
15686 CGL_ubyte byte = 0;
15687 if (fread(&byte, sizeof(CGL_ubyte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15688 if (byte != png_signature[i]) return CGL_FALSE;
15689 }
15690 fseek(file, 0, SEEK_SET);
15691 return CGL_TRUE;
15692}
15693
15694CGL_bool CGL_image_file_is_png(const CGL_byte* file_path)
15695{
15696 FILE* file = fopen(file_path, "rb");
15697 if (file == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15698 CGL_bool result = CGL_image_file_is_png_f(file);
15699 fclose(file);
15700 return result;
15701}
15702
15703CGL_bool CGL_image_file_is_bmp_f(FILE* file)
15704{
15705 CGL_byte d_i8 = 0;
15706 CGL_uint d_u32 = 0;
15707 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15708 if (d_i8 != 'B') return CGL_FALSE;
15709 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15710 if (d_i8 != 'M') return CGL_FALSE;
15711 if (fread(&d_u32, sizeof(CGL_uint), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE; // file size
15712 if (fread(&d_u32, sizeof(CGL_uint), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE; // reserved
15713 if (fread(&d_u32, sizeof(CGL_uint), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE; // data offset
15714 if (fread(&d_u32, sizeof(CGL_uint), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE; // header size
15715 fseek(file, 0, SEEK_SET);
15716 return (d_u32 == 12 || d_u32 == 40 || d_u32 == 56 || d_u32 == 108 || d_u32 == 124);
15717}
15718
15719CGL_bool CGL_image_file_is_bmp(const CGL_byte* file_path)
15720{
15721 FILE* file = fopen(file_path, "rb");
15722 if (file == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15723 CGL_bool result = CGL_image_file_is_bmp_f(file);
15724 fclose(file);
15725 return result;
15726}
15727
15728CGL_bool CGL_image_file_is_gif_f(FILE* file)
15729{
15730 CGL_byte d_i8 = 0;
15731 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15732 if (d_i8 != 'G') return CGL_FALSE;
15733 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15734 if (d_i8 != 'I') return CGL_FALSE;
15735 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15736 if (d_i8 != 'F') return CGL_FALSE;
15737 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15738 if (d_i8 != '8') return CGL_FALSE;
15739 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15740 if (d_i8 != '7' && d_i8 != '9') return CGL_FALSE;
15741 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15742 if (d_i8 != 'a') return CGL_FALSE;
15743 fseek(file, 0, SEEK_SET);
15744 return CGL_TRUE;
15745}
15746
15747CGL_bool CGL_image_file_is_gif(const CGL_byte* file_path)
15748{
15749 FILE* file = fopen(file_path, "rb");
15750 if (file == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15751 CGL_bool result = CGL_image_file_is_gif_f(file);
15752 fclose(file);
15753 return result;
15754}
15755
15756CGL_bool CGL_image_file_is_jpeg_f(FILE* file)
15757{
15758 CGL_ubyte d_i8 = 0;
15759 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15760 if (d_i8 != 0xFF) return CGL_FALSE;
15761 if (fread(&d_i8, sizeof(CGL_byte), 1, file) != 1) return CGL_FALSE;
15762 if (d_i8 != 0xD8) return CGL_FALSE;
15763 fseek(file, 0, SEEK_SET);
15764 return CGL_TRUE;
15765}
15766
15767CGL_bool CGL_image_file_is_jpeg(const CGL_byte* file_path)
15768{
15769
15770 FILE* file = fopen(file_path, "rb");
15771 if (file == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15772 CGL_bool result = CGL_image_file_is_jpeg_f(file);
15773 fclose(file);
15774 return result;
15775}
15776
15777CGL_int CGL_image_file_get_format_f(FILE* file)
15778{
15779 if (CGL_image_file_is_png_f(file)) return CGL_IMAGE_FORMAT_PNG;
15780 if (CGL_image_file_is_bmp_f(file)) return CGL_IMAGE_FORMAT_BMP;
15781 if (CGL_image_file_is_gif_f(file)) return CGL_IMAGE_FORMAT_GIF;
15782 if (CGL_image_file_is_jpeg_f(file)) return CGL_IMAGE_FORMAT_JPEG;
15783 return CGL_IMAGE_FORMAT_UNKNOWN;
15784}
15785
15786CGL_int CGL_image_file_get_format(const CGL_byte* file_path)
15787{
15788 FILE* file = fopen(file_path, "rb");
15789 if (file == NULL) return CGL_FALSE;
15790 CGL_int result = CGL_image_file_get_format_f(file);
15791 fclose(file);
15792 return result;
15793}
15794
15795#endif
15796
15797
15798#ifndef CGL_EXCLUDE_ND_TREE_API
15799
15800struct CGL_nd_tree
15801{
15802 CGL_bool(*aabb_subdivide_function)(CGL_int, CGL_float*, CGL_float*, CGL_float*, CGL_float*);
15803 CGL_bool(*aabb_contains_point_function)(CGL_int, CGL_float*, CGL_float*, CGL_float*);
15804 CGL_bool(*aabb_intersects_aabb_function)(CGL_int, CGL_float*, CGL_float*, CGL_float*, CGL_float*);
15805
15806 CGL_sizei* children_node_pointers;
15807 CGL_float* children_node_aabbs;
15808 CGL_nd_tree_node* nodes_bank;
15809 CGL_int nodes_bank_size;
15810
15811 CGL_float* positions_bank;
15812 CGL_sizei positions_bank_size;
15813
15814 CGL_void* memory_bank;
15815 CGL_sizei mem_bank_allocation_count;
15816 CGL_sizei max_mem_banks;
15817 CGL_sizei max_items_total;
15818
15819 CGL_float* aabb_out_min_tmp;
15820 CGL_float* aabb_out_max_tmp;
15821
15822 CGL_int max_items_per_node;
15823 CGL_int items_per_node;
15824 CGL_int bank_size_per_node;
15825 CGL_int dimension;
15826 CGL_bool fast_approx_check;
15827 CGL_sizei item_size;
15828 CGL_int max_depth;
15829};
15830
15831struct CGL_nd_tree_node
15832{
15833 CGL_sizei banks[CGL_ND_TREE_MAX_MEMORY_BANKS_PER_NODE];
15834 CGL_int items_count;
15835 CGL_int max_capacity;
15836 CGL_int depth;
15837 CGL_float* aabb_min;
15838 CGL_float* aabb_max;
15839 CGL_sizei* children_nodes;
15840 CGL_bool has_been_subdivided;
15841};
15842
15843CGL_nd_tree* CGL_nd_tree_create(CGL_int dimensions, CGL_sizei item_size, CGL_int max_items_per_node, CGL_sizei max_nodes, CGL_sizei max_items, CGL_bool store_positions)
15844{
15845 // the main tree object
15846 CGL_nd_tree* tree = (CGL_nd_tree*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_nd_tree));
15847 if (tree == NULL) return NULL;
15848
15849 // copy the simple values
15850 tree->dimension = dimensions;
15851 tree->item_size = item_size;
15852 tree->max_items_total = max_items;
15853
15854 tree->aabb_out_max_tmp = (CGL_float*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_float) * (CGL_long)(1 << dimensions) * dimensions);
15855 if (tree->aabb_out_max_tmp == NULL)
15856 {
15857 CGL_free(tree);
15858 return NULL;
15859 }
15860
15861 tree->aabb_out_min_tmp = (CGL_float*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_float) * (CGL_long)(1 << dimensions) * dimensions);
15862 if (tree->aabb_out_min_tmp == NULL)
15863 {
15864 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_max_tmp);
15865 CGL_free(tree);
15866 return NULL;
15867 }
15868 // the position bank stores the positions of the items
15869 // this is allocated and used only if the user wants to store the positions
15870 // NOTE: if this is not allocated, the tree will always use fast approximations
15871 tree->positions_bank = NULL;
15872 tree->positions_bank_size = 0;
15873 if (store_positions)
15874 {
15875 // preallocate the position bank with all possible particles
15876 tree->positions_bank = (CGL_float*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_float) * dimensions * max_items);
15877 if (tree->positions_bank == NULL)
15878 {
15879 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_max_tmp);
15880 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_min_tmp);
15881 CGL_free(tree);
15882 return NULL;
15883 }
15884 }
15885
15886 // we choose the aabb subdivide function based on the dimensions
15887 // for 2d and 3d we use hard coded functions rather than special
15888 // algorithm as they are relatively simple to code and way faster
15889 if (dimensions == 2) tree->aabb_subdivide_function = CGL_aabb_subdivide_2d;
15890 else if (dimensions == 3) tree->aabb_subdivide_function = CGL_aabb_subdivide_3d; // 3d is not implemented yet
15891 else tree->aabb_subdivide_function = CGL_aabb_subdivide_nd;
15892
15893
15894 if (dimensions == 2) tree->aabb_contains_point_function = CGL_aabb_contains_point_2d;
15895 else if (dimensions == 3) tree->aabb_contains_point_function = CGL_aabb_contains_point_3d;
15896 else tree->aabb_contains_point_function = CGL_aabb_contains_point_nd;
15897
15898
15899 if (dimensions == 2) tree->aabb_intersects_aabb_function = CGL_aabb_intersects_aabb_2d;
15900 else if (dimensions == 3) tree->aabb_intersects_aabb_function = CGL_aabb_intersects_aabb_3d;
15901 else tree->aabb_intersects_aabb_function = CGL_aabb_intersects_aabb_nd;
15902
15903 // allocate the nodes bank
15904 tree->nodes_bank = (CGL_nd_tree_node*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_nd_tree_node) * max_nodes);
15905 tree->nodes_bank_size = 0;
15906 if (tree->nodes_bank == NULL)
15907 {
15908 if (tree->positions_bank) CGL_free(tree->positions_bank);
15909 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_max_tmp);
15910 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_min_tmp);
15911 CGL_free(tree);
15912 return NULL;
15913 }
15914
15915 tree->children_node_pointers = (CGL_sizei*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_sizei) * (CGL_long)(1 << dimensions) * max_nodes);
15916 if (tree->children_node_pointers == NULL)
15917 {
15918 if (tree->positions_bank) CGL_free(tree->positions_bank);
15919 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_max_tmp);
15920 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_min_tmp);
15921 CGL_free(tree->nodes_bank);
15922 CGL_free(tree);
15923 }
15924
15925 tree->children_node_aabbs = (CGL_float*)CGL_malloc(sizeof(CGL_float) * dimensions * 2 * (CGL_long)(1 << dimensions) * max_nodes);
15926 if (tree->children_node_aabbs == NULL)
15927 {
15928 if (tree->positions_bank) CGL_free(tree->positions_bank);
15929 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_max_tmp);
15930 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_min_tmp);
15931 CGL_free(tree->nodes_bank);
15932 CGL_free(tree->children_node_pointers);
15933 CGL_free(tree);
15934 }
15935
15936 // set the children node pointers
15937 for (CGL_sizei i = 0; i < max_nodes; i++)
15938 {
15939 tree->nodes_bank[i].children_nodes = tree->children_node_pointers + (1 << dimensions) * (CGL_int)i;
15940 tree->nodes_bank[i].aabb_min = tree->children_node_aabbs + dimensions * 2 * (1 << dimensions) * i;
15941 tree->nodes_bank[i].aabb_max = tree->nodes_bank[i].aabb_min + dimensions;
15942 }
15943
15944
15945 // allocate the memory bank
15946 // the memory bank will store the item banks
15947 // an item bank is a solid collection of min(10, max_items_per_node) items
15948 tree->memory_bank = (CGL_void*)CGL_malloc((sizeof(CGL_sizei) + item_size) * max_items);
15949 tree->mem_bank_allocation_count = 0;
15950 if (tree->memory_bank == NULL)
15951 {
15952 if (tree->positions_bank) CGL_free(tree->positions_bank);
15953 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_max_tmp);
15954 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_min_tmp);
15955 CGL_free(tree->nodes_bank);
15956 CGL_free(tree->children_node_pointers);
15957 CGL_free(tree->children_node_aabbs);
15958 CGL_free(tree);
15959 }
15960
15961 // calculate the size of the banks
15962 tree->bank_size_per_node = CGL_utils_min(CGL_ND_TREE_MAX_ITEMS_PER_MEMORY_BANK, max_items_per_node);
15963 tree->max_items_per_node = max_items_per_node;
15964
15965
15966 return tree;
15967}
15968
15969CGL_nd_tree* CGL_quad_tree_create(CGL_sizei item_size, CGL_int max_items_per_node, CGL_sizei max_nodes, CGL_sizei max_items, CGL_bool store_positions)
15970{
15971 return CGL_nd_tree_create(2, item_size, max_items_per_node, max_nodes, max_items, store_positions);
15972}
15973
15974CGL_nd_tree* CGL_oct_tree_create(CGL_sizei item_size, CGL_int max_items_per_node, CGL_sizei max_nodes, CGL_sizei max_items, CGL_bool store_positions)
15975{
15976 return CGL_nd_tree_create(3, item_size, max_items_per_node, max_nodes, max_items, store_positions);
15977}
15978
15979CGL_void CGL_nd_tree_destroy(CGL_nd_tree* tree)
15980{
15981 if (tree == NULL) return;
15982 // free the positions bank
15983 if (tree->positions_bank) CGL_free(tree->positions_bank);
15984 // free tmp aabb_min and aabb_max
15985 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_min_tmp);
15986 CGL_free(tree->aabb_out_max_tmp);
15987 // free the nodes bank
15988 CGL_free(tree->nodes_bank);
15989 // free the children node pointers
15990 CGL_free(tree->children_node_pointers);
15991 // free the children node aabbs
15992 CGL_free(tree->children_node_aabbs);
15993 // free the memory bank
15994 CGL_free(tree->memory_bank);
15995 // free the tree
15996 CGL_free(tree);
15997}
15998
15999CGL_sizei __CGL_nd_tree_add_node(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_int parent_depth, CGL_float* aabb_min, CGL_float* aabb_max)
16000{
16001 // NOTE: we do not check here if the nodes bank is full
16002 // as we assume that the user will do this sanely
16003 // thus by that we can avoid a lot of checks per frame
16004 // and make the code faster
16005 CGL_nd_tree_node* node = &tree->nodes_bank[tree->nodes_bank_size++];
16006 node->max_capacity = 0;
16007 node->items_count = 0;
16008 node->depth = parent_depth + 1;
16009 node->has_been_subdivided = CGL_FALSE;
16010
16011 if (aabb_min && aabb_max)
16012 {
16013 // copy the aabbs
16014 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < tree->dimension; i++)
16015 {
16016 node->aabb_min[i] = aabb_min[i];
16017 node->aabb_max[i] = aabb_max[i];
16018 }
16019 }
16020
16021 return tree->nodes_bank_size - 1;
16022}
16023
16024CGL_bool CGL_nd_tree_reset(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_float* aabb_min, CGL_float* aabb_max, CGL_int items_per_node, CGL_int max_depth, CGL_bool fast_approx_mode)
16025{
16026 // reset the tree
16027 tree->positions_bank_size = 0;
16028 tree->nodes_bank_size = 0;
16029 tree->mem_bank_allocation_count = 0;
16030 tree->fast_approx_check = fast_approx_mode;
16031 tree->max_depth = max_depth;
16032 tree->items_per_node = items_per_node;
16033 tree->bank_size_per_node = CGL_utils_min(CGL_ND_TREE_MAX_ITEMS_PER_MEMORY_BANK, tree->max_items_per_node);
16034 tree->max_mem_banks = tree->max_items_total / tree->bank_size_per_node;
16035
16036 // add the root node
16037 // parent depth is -1 as the root node has no parent
16038 __CGL_nd_tree_add_node(tree, -1, aabb_min, aabb_max);
16039
16040 return CGL_TRUE;
16041}
16042
16043CGL_bool CGL_quad_tree_reset(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_float x_min, CGL_float y_min, CGL_float x_max, CGL_float y_max, CGL_int items_per_node, CGL_int max_depth, CGL_bool fast_approx_mode)
16044{
16045 CGL_float aabb_min[2] = { x_min, y_min };
16046 CGL_float aabb_max[2] = { x_max, y_max };
16047 return CGL_nd_tree_reset(tree, aabb_min, aabb_max, items_per_node, max_depth, fast_approx_mode);
16048}
16049
16050CGL_bool CGL_oct_tree_reset(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_float x_min, CGL_float y_min, CGL_float z_min, CGL_float x_max, CGL_float y_max, CGL_float z_max, CGL_int items_per_node, CGL_int max_depth, CGL_bool fast_approx_mode)
16051{
16052 CGL_float aabb_min[3] = { x_min, y_min, z_min };
16053 CGL_float aabb_max[3] = { x_max, y_max, z_max };
16054 return CGL_nd_tree_reset(tree, aabb_min, aabb_max, items_per_node, max_depth, fast_approx_mode);
16055}
16056
16057CGL_bool __CGL_nd_tree_node_add_item(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_nd_tree_node* node, CGL_sizei position_bank_index, CGL_void* item)
16058{
16059 // calculate some common values
16060 CGL_sizei current_bank_index = (node->items_count) / tree->bank_size_per_node;
16061 CGL_sizei current_bank_item_index = (node->items_count) % tree->bank_size_per_node;
16062
16063 // check if the node has enough capacity
16064 if (node->items_count >= node->max_capacity)
16065 {
16066 // if new memory bank is not allowed then return false
16067 if (current_bank_index >= CGL_ND_TREE_MAX_MEMORY_BANKS_PER_NODE) return CGL_FALSE;
16068 // we need to allocate another memory bank for this node
16069 if (tree->mem_bank_allocation_count > tree->max_mem_banks) return CGL_FALSE;
16070 node->banks[current_bank_index] = (tree->mem_bank_allocation_count++) * (sizeof(CGL_sizei) + tree->item_size) * tree->bank_size_per_node;
16071 node->max_capacity += tree->bank_size_per_node;
16072 }
16073
16074 if (current_bank_index >= CGL_ND_TREE_MAX_MEMORY_BANKS_PER_NODE) return CGL_FALSE;
16075
16076 // get the memory pointers
16077 CGL_ubyte* memory_bank = (CGL_ubyte*)tree->memory_bank + node->banks[current_bank_index];
16078 CGL_ubyte* item_memory = memory_bank + current_bank_item_index * (sizeof(CGL_sizei) + tree->item_size);
16079
16080
16081 // copy the values
16082 //((CGL_sizei*)item_memory)[0] = position_bank_index;
16083 *(CGL_sizei*)item_memory = position_bank_index;
16084 if (tree->item_size == 4) *(CGL_int*)((CGL_ubyte*)item_memory + sizeof(CGL_sizei)) = *(CGL_int*)item;
16085 else if (tree->item_size == 8) ((CGL_sizei*)item_memory)[1] = *(CGL_sizei*)item;
16086 else memcpy((CGL_ubyte*)item_memory + sizeof(CGL_sizei), item, tree->item_size);
16087
16088 // update count
16089 node->items_count += 1;
16090
16091 return CGL_TRUE;
16092}
16093
16094CGL_bool __CGL_nd_tree_node_add(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_sizei node_id, CGL_float* position, CGL_void* item, CGL_sizei position_bank_index, CGL_int depth)
16095{
16096 CGL_nd_tree_node* node = &tree->nodes_bank[node_id];
16097 // check if the item is inside the node or not
16098 // if (!tree->aabb_contains_point_function(tree->dimension, node->aabb_min, node->aabb_max, position)) return CGL_FALSE;
16099
16100 // check if we are at the max depth
16101 if (depth == tree->max_depth)
16102 {
16103 // if we are at the max depth then we add the item to the node
16104 // no matter the node is full or not
16105 __CGL_nd_tree_node_add_item(tree, node, position_bank_index, item);
16106 return CGL_TRUE;
16107 }
16108
16109 // check if the node is already full
16110 if (node->items_count >= tree->items_per_node)
16111 {
16112 // here we need to subdivide current node creating children nodes if it has not already been divided
16113 if (!node->has_been_subdivided)
16114 {
16115 // first calculate the aabb of children nodes of this node
16116 if (!tree->aabb_subdivide_function(tree->dimension, node->aabb_min, node->aabb_max, tree->aabb_out_min_tmp, tree->aabb_out_max_tmp)) return CGL_FALSE;
16117
16118 // initialize the appropiate nodes
16119 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < (1 << tree->dimension); i++)
16120 {
16121 CGL_float* nd_aabb_min = tree->aabb_out_min_tmp + i * tree->dimension;
16122 CGL_float* nd_aabb_max = tree->aabb_out_max_tmp + i * tree->dimension;
16123 node->children_nodes[i] = __CGL_nd_tree_add_node(tree, node->depth, nd_aabb_min, nd_aabb_max);
16124 }
16125
16126 node->has_been_subdivided = CGL_TRUE;
16127 }
16128 // add the point to the appropiate child node
16129 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < (1 << tree->dimension); i++)
16130 {
16131 CGL_nd_tree_node* child_node = &tree->nodes_bank[node->children_nodes[i]];
16132 if (tree->aabb_contains_point_function(tree->dimension, child_node->aabb_min, child_node->aabb_max, position))
16133 if (__CGL_nd_tree_node_add(tree, node->children_nodes[i], position, item, position_bank_index, depth + 1))
16134 return CGL_TRUE;
16135 }
16136 }
16137 else
16138 {
16139 // the node is not full so we add the item to the node
16140 return __CGL_nd_tree_node_add_item(tree, node, position_bank_index, item);
16141 }
16142
16143 // this should never happen
16144 return CGL_FALSE;
16145}
16146
16147CGL_bool CGL_nd_tree_add(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_float* position, CGL_void* item)
16148{
16149 // this is allocated only if positions are to be stored
16150 if (tree->positions_bank)
16151 {
16152 if (tree->positions_bank_size >= tree->max_items_total) return CGL_FALSE;
16153 memcpy(tree->positions_bank + tree->positions_bank_size, position, sizeof(CGL_float) * tree->dimension);
16154 tree->positions_bank_size += tree->dimension;
16155 }
16156 if (tree->aabb_contains_point_function(tree->dimension, tree->nodes_bank[0].aabb_min, tree->nodes_bank[0].aabb_max, position))
16157 return __CGL_nd_tree_node_add(tree, 0, position, item, tree->positions_bank_size - tree->dimension, 0);
16158 return CGL_FALSE;
16159}
16160
16161CGL_bool CGL_quad_tree_add(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_float px, CGL_float py, CGL_void* item)
16162{
16163 CGL_float position[2] = { px, py };
16164 return CGL_nd_tree_add(tree, position, item);
16165}
16166
16167CGL_bool CGL_oct_tree_add(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_float px, CGL_float py, CGL_float pz, CGL_void* item)
16168{
16169 CGL_float position[3] = { px, py, pz };
16170 return CGL_nd_tree_add(tree, position, item);
16171}
16172
16173
16174
16175CGL_int __CGL_nd_tree_node_get_items_in_range(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_nd_tree_node* node, CGL_float* p_min, CGL_float* p_max, CGL_void* items_out, CGL_int max_items, CGL_int items_size)
16176{
16177 if (items_size >= max_items) return items_size;
16178
16179 // if (!tree->aabb_intersects_aabb_function(tree->dimension, node->aabb_min, node->aabb_max, p_min, p_max)) return items_size;
16180
16181 static CGL_sizei current_bank_index = 0;
16182 static CGL_sizei current_bank_item_index = 0;
16183 static CGL_sizei position_index = 0;
16184 static CGL_bool point_include_condition = 0;
16185 static CGL_ubyte* item = NULL;
16186
16187
16188 // first iterate through over the items in this node
16189 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < node->items_count; i++)
16190 {
16191 current_bank_index = i / tree->bank_size_per_node;
16192 current_bank_item_index = i % tree->bank_size_per_node;
16193 item = (CGL_ubyte*)tree->memory_bank + node->banks[current_bank_index] + current_bank_item_index * (sizeof(CGL_sizei) + tree->item_size);
16194 position_index = *(CGL_sizei*)item;
16195 point_include_condition = CGL_TRUE;
16196 if (tree->positions_bank != NULL && !tree->fast_approx_check) point_include_condition = tree->aabb_contains_point_function(tree->dimension, p_min, p_max, tree->positions_bank + position_index);
16197 if (point_include_condition) memcpy((CGL_ubyte*)items_out + (items_size++) * tree->item_size, item + sizeof(CGL_sizei), tree->item_size);
16198 }
16199
16200
16201 // if the node is not a leaf we iterate over its children
16202 if (node->has_been_subdivided)
16203 {
16204 for (CGL_int i = 0; i < (1 << tree->dimension); i++)
16205 {
16206 if (tree->aabb_intersects_aabb_function(tree->dimension, tree->nodes_bank[node->children_nodes[i]].aabb_min, tree->nodes_bank[node->children_nodes[i]].aabb_max, p_min, p_max))
16207 items_size = __CGL_nd_tree_node_get_items_in_range(tree, &tree->nodes_bank[node->children_nodes[i]], p_min, p_max, items_out, max_items, items_size);
16208 }
16209 }
16210
16211 return items_size;
16212}
16213
16214CGL_int CGL_nd_tree_get_items_in_range(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_float* p_min, CGL_float* p_max, CGL_void* items_out, CGL_int max_items)
16215{
16216 if (tree->aabb_intersects_aabb_function(tree->dimension, tree->nodes_bank[0].aabb_min, tree->nodes_bank[0].aabb_max, p_min, p_max))
16217 return __CGL_nd_tree_node_get_items_in_range(tree, &tree->nodes_bank[0], p_min, p_max, items_out, max_items, 0);
16218 return 0;
16219}
16220
16221CGL_int CGL_quad_tree_get_items_in_range(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_float x_min, CGL_float y_min, CGL_float x_max, CGL_float y_max, CGL_void* items_out, CGL_int max_items)
16222{
16223 CGL_float p_min[2] = { x_min, y_min };
16224 CGL_float p_max[2] = { x_max, y_max };
16225 return CGL_nd_tree_get_items_in_range(tree, p_min, p_max, items_out, max_items);
16226}
16227
16228CGL_int CGL_oct_tree_get_items_in_range(CGL_nd_tree* tree, CGL_float x_min, CGL_float y_min, CGL_float z_min, CGL_float x_max, CGL_float y_max, CGL_float z_max, CGL_void* items_out, CGL_int max_items)
16229{
16230 CGL_float p_min[3] = { x_min, y_min, z_min };
16231 CGL_float p_max[3] = { x_max, y_max, z_max };
16232 return CGL_nd_tree_get_items_in_range(tree, p_min, p_max, items_out, max_items);
16233}
16234
16235
16236
16237#endif
16238
16239
16240#endif // CGL_IMPLEMENTATION
16241
16242#endif // CGL_H
